description: Trail Provides excellent views of the front ranges. Very unusual feature for a hike in Banff is that it's relatively flatNTS Map: 082O06Elevation Gain: Minimal
directions: Follow Hiway 1A west from Cochrane to junction with Forestry trunk road (940). Watch for Richard's Road on your left (pavement ends just after). On your left, there is a gated road (TransAlta) - close the gate behind you. About 16km down the road you come to a hill that warns continuing on is not recommended. If you have a 4X4 continue for about another 3 km to parking lot.
title: Devils Gap and Ghost Lakes
